Description: Glazed composition rectangular spacer-bead, with three lateral perforations on the short axis; front and back decorated with three oval, dough-nut shaped rings, surrounded by a rectangular frame, which is deeper at one narrow end; these decorated faces have a slightly convex curve, while narrow short sides are straight; greenish yellow glaze, much rubbed; core dirty buff, hard.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (QC.5)
